00028 #include <new>
00029 #include "../MEM_guardedalloc.h"
00030 
00031 void* operator new (size_t size)
00032 {
00033     return MEM_mallocN(size, "C++/anonymous");
00034 }
00035 
00036 /* not default but can be used when needing to set a string */
00037 void* operator new (size_t size, const char *str)
00038 {
00039     return MEM_mallocN(size, str);
00040 }
00041 
00042 void operator delete (void *p)
00043 {
00044     MEM_freeN(p);
00045 }
